name: Altergeist Dragvirion
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When a Special Summoned monster your opponent controls declares an attack: You can return 1 "Altergeist" monster you control to the hand; negate that attack. If this card is Tributed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Altergeist Dragvirion" once per turn.
